title: Vinewood Undead Collection
headline: Vinewood Undead Collection
content:
Complete the first three weeks of Weekly Challenges this month to get the Vinewood Undead Collection — consisting of the new Slasher Clown Outfit, the rare Please Stop Me Mask, Vinewood Zombie Tee, and the all-over Skulls livery for the Mammoth Avenger.

— October 2–8: Survive two Waves in a Survival without dying
— October 9–15: Complete three Taxi Fares
— October 16–22: Win one Adversary Mode

All Weekly Challenges also reward double the usual GTA$ and include collectible Halloween Masks.
